title: Today is the Joyful Hinamatsuri
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Let’s light the lanterns~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You’ve been singing that for a while now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ehehe~, because today is the best day to sing this song!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Well, I guess that’s true.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Why don’t you sing it too, Maki-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I’m good. Besides, you’re already singing it, Rin.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eeh, Rin wants to sing with you nya, Maki-chan! Let’s sing! One, two, three, four!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>L-, let’s light the.... Wait, I said I’m not going to sing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hmm, just a little bit more nya.... That’s right, Rin will go get Kayochin! If there are 3 of us, then Maki-chan wouldn’t be embarrassed nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Wait, Rin! It’s not like I don’t want to sing because I’m embarrassed.... Rin! Riiin!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
